entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
